author: Chloe Anastasia Phillips
comment: I like this app. Works very well if you need to receive a text from a service you're not sure about or have exceeded the usage limit with your own phone number. Take Outlook for example. I also hear you can use this to make calls and texts while only connected via the Internet so handy if you don't have cellular signal. Highly recommended.

author: Carrie Honeycutt
comment: Really great app. I use it when I have no cell service but have Wi-Fi. Really really love it. It has problems opening up from time to time though, I'm not sure why. It's not a connection problem I would like to have this fixed, but it's no big deal most of the time. Still a really great app!

author: martin berdon
comment: Good app.  I use when overseas to have US number local #  I can be reached at. Doesn't cost anyone to call me.  Cost for me to call is cheap, pennies per minute.  This is one of the few VoIP that  do calls, texts, text  pictures, and is fast. AND works over cellular or wifi.    When in a foreign country I get cheap local sim card,  and the text me VoIP works over cellular 3/4g. Most don't.   I purchase my # and keep it as long as need .  If interface and ads were cleaner and totally removeable, id give it 5 stars. It still has offers showing, and isn't real clean.   For some reason, notifications don't always work when receive call or msg.  Also, it doesn't do group messages well at all. It sends out separate messages to each recipient.  On incoming, you can't see who else was on it and respond to them too. It will hang sending to multiple people if photo attached too, only first recipient goes out.      Fix these things and it would be awesome

author: Kerri Chung
comment: The app is decent but what blew me away was the customer service. I had to factory reset my phone (OS upgrade gone bad!) and couldn't remember my login info. I contacted them, explained the situation, and Apolline was super helpful in getting me re-connected. Thanks!!

author: Aaron Lundquist
comment: This app is awesome.   If you ever needed to make a phone call and have nothing but WiFi.  Here's an app that will call anyone with a number of your c hosing that's an area code of your choice including local.  I was in awe when I seen that it can make phone calls with my local area code as my area default.  That's pretty rare until now.

author: Andrew Maynard
comment: This app is almost impossible to use today. I keep getting pop ups that close the app nonstop. I get that you want to make money but you need customers to view the ads.

author: Kévin Bée
comment: Don't fall into the trap and go use TextNow! Too many adds (literally everywhere they could put one), low quality phone calls often cutting, text messages that are never received, constantly threatening that you'll lose your number.

author: Rick O' Dean
comment: THE WORST TEXT APP!!! There are way, way, way too many ads. Do yourself a favor and get text now or text free, they are the best text apps. This app is a joke. When you send a picture, the recipient gets a link to follow to see the picture. This doesn't happen with text now or text free. These people have no clue what they're doing. When I started using this app I started getting a pop up in Google Chrome telling me my phone was infected. Stay away from this text app. My favorites are text free and text now. Both those apps do not put ads in your text messages

author: A C.
comment: I don't understand this app. What are the credits for if it is free? Is one credit for one text? Am I being charged for this? Why doesn't it explain all this in the FAQ? I think it is shady to say it is free if it is only free to text someone else with the the app. The Terms say you can only cancel via Google wallet. WTH? Did I agree to this just by downloading? If I uninstall do I still have to cancel? All this info needs to be explained BEFORE you download the app.

author: Jamie Munn
comment: When I down loaded the app it says I can recieve picture and video and all tjat. I had it for a couple months now. It will not allow me to recieve pictures and everytime I get a phone call or make a call after e mins it totally cuts me off.

author: Moka Pt
comment: Guys this app is mad, i dont even need to watch videos, just ask someone you know to spam u with texts and you get credits. Peace guys

It's great to use. I love talking to my friends and everyone. It is great quality. It works very well. The only bad thing is there are a lot of ads and sometimes it can be slow but other than that it's awesome!

author: amorina brown
comment: Ive never had any issues using this app., receiving my messages, or making,& receiving my calls. There was plenty of numbers to pick from in the area code I wanted,& even the pop ups dont get in the way.

author: Amelia Galligos- Bussiere
comment: It's a great "free" app receive and send messages quickly buy voice calls you have to have headset on... but if you lose your number to non use it gives you a new one but won't allow you to change it. Also still recommend this to others

author: Rookie Attempted Art
comment: I revoke my previous statement. Its a great app when you learn how the settings work. I've had very few problems all and all a great app for a great price: FREE

author: michael mitchell
comment: With every update this gets buggier and worse to use but it's better than nothing.  Update: as this app develops they are trying to force you into paid features and the damn thing crashes 50% of the time that I send a text and sometimes I won't receive texts for a day or more.

author: Kimberlie Sasan
comment: The ridiculous number of ads makes this app difficult to use. And they are conveniently placed where the typing area is, so you accidentally hit it. Annoying AF. And the expiring burner number... why? If I'm using the app every day, why does the # expire every 2 weeks?? Looking for another app now.

author: kevin stamps
comment: Works ok but throw false ads in to fake mms and eventually mms wouldn't show full quality after they sit in your chat for a while

author: Robeon Mew
comment: BRILLIANT! Blocks the creepy apam and collection ćafents". Everyone download this. It also shows any numbers to their Facebook or other media sites. 💝💝💝🗽🍁

author: Aryana Elie
comment: I like this app but it has flaws like how you can not video chat people and how you need WiFi access to use the app -_-

author: Michael Switzer Jr.
comment: I always get virus warnings with this app! Too many ads it basically cons you into clicking everything intentionally.

author: Raul Diaz
comment: When you use your contacts it directs you to virus sites. Use text now better this app will harm your phone

author: Syaoran Lie
comment: It doesn't give me any number, after wait for 15 minutes of reservation a number all it does is something went wrong

author: Alejandra Castro
comment: It's great. I am from Colombia and have been working in United States. This app let's me call my wife's regular phone and text her while she is not on any app!

author: Lisa
comment: I really like this app but I hate that with the last update it now says "sent by text me" on every text I want to sent.

author: NA NA
comment: After recent update it just hangs and stalls. Went to homepage for refund and it was 404 that page doesnt exist.
It is like so good when Im alone I can call and text all my best freinds whoever made this app was amazing 😮 so ya byee ✋

author: DeMoss Mark
comment: This app it's better than all the other apps combined. How to write if I were to rate I would need a million pieces of paper it's a million stars

author: Riley Cherner
comment: The ad situation with this app is out of control. They need to scale back, more then a little
Works pretty well.. Not too many ads and simple enough to use.

author: Mick Taylor
comment: Great when it works but sadly it's rare. Videos for credits never work it's a mess

author: Jessie Giffin
comment: i am starteing to get calls from diffrenet countrys, ppl i dont know, i am about to uninstalll
It is kinda glitchy  but it still works it updates alot

author: Sierra Byington
comment: Why does mine tell me at The end of everything I text say --sent from text me It is really annoying please make it stop if possible
Sucks don't work half the time dont download

author: Kyle Bradford
comment: When your girl blocks you, you can still get through w this app - don't F it up, say you're sorry and offer her tacos.
Nice app but I wish it had no credits thank you!

author: DeMonte Simmons
comment: Great App But Too Many Ads Get In Your Way When Youre Trying Write A Text Message

author: Juni Fanti
comment: Fake... nothing free. All are paid. Change ur app description.

author: Rolando Perez
comment: Been using it for a while, however, after last update, the amount annoying ads make it impossible to use it.  Please do something about it.
